A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: J.J. Abrams has a Space Slug-sized task ahead of him for Episode IX as Rian Johnson's The Last Jedi is an incredibly\, almost impossible\, tough act to follow. It is THAT good. Johnson has propelled the franchise into a league of its own that channels its beloved heritage while being boldly fresh\, unapologetically new\, and bluntly announcing to fans and nerds: \"This is not your parents' Star Wars.\"
